adjectives.description: animally (comparative more animally, superlative most animally)

entries.meaning: Resembling or characteristic of an animal.

adverbs.description: animally (comparative more animally, superlative most animally)

entries.meaning: In respect of the physical or "animal" faculties, as opposed to the intellect or spirit.
examples: ‘Cosmic emotion’ inevitably takes them in the form of enthusiasm and freedom. I speak not only of those who are animally happy.

entries.meaning: (obsolete) In respect of the anima or animal spirits.
